configuration.content:
Welcome to the Upstream Watershed Finder!

Enter your address, zip code, or city to zoom the map to your location of interest. Then click on a watershed catchment to look up it's ID. Enter that ID in the Upstream Tool, then click submit. Wait a moment for the application to generate your upstream watersheds.

Once you're done with that, turn on other layers with the More... tab to view aquatic invasive species reports throughout the state.
